original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Tibet Qinghai Express
overview: The Third Millennium marked the inauguration of a unique train, the Tibet Qinghai Express that travels from China to Tibet. A railroad through the Himalayas on highest railway line on earth that leads through breathtaking landscapes from Peking to Lhasa. The journey lasts about forty eight hours & includes two nights on the train. The Tibet Qinghai Express has turned many dreams into reality!
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Tibet Qinghai Express
